better than Back 4 Blood by a long shot.

If you've only played Left 4 Dead 2 and was curious to see the differences, then I definitely recommend picking this up on sale. While the campaigns and core gameplay is very similar, the whole game has a different feel to it. Much simpler, and more grounded in reality tone wise. And while there's significantly less content in comparison, everything feels more polished. For instance, there are very few guns in this, but every single one feels more weighty and satisfying to use. Overall, there are a bunch of minor changes that I think make this game worth while to come back to and try out.
this game rule. im the speed run god

Este juego jamás dejará de ser la mera "paipa". Desde que comienzas a jugar se te reinicia la vida. Tomar una buen birra y unas patatuelas que el nivel adictivo de esta joya es inigualable. Arriba mis chivas rayadas del guadalajara.

画风比求生之路2粗糙一些，但是也有属于自己的特色。无聊的时候拿来打发打发时间挺不错的。

The Original Left 4 Dead for me is far better than it's sequel Left 4 Dead 2 in terms of animation, the ambience was far more creepy and terrifying. The Atmosphere here is more dark and dramatic compared to it's successor (L4D2), which is more badass. The Nostalgia always hit me on the start of the game especially the soundtrack intro. It always reminds me of my childhood as i stroll down the memory lane.

I recommend this game because it's way more competitive than it's sequel, It's a bit quite harder. No Melees and Pure Gunfights, a classic co-op indeed. The game never gets old no matter how many times you've played it already.

R.I.P Jim French / William "Bill" Overbeck (1929-2017)

Muy lindo juego. Uno de esos clásicos que todo ser debe jugar. Hermoso para jugar con amigos. Los gráficos están muy bien y anda para cualquier PC. Tiene muchos ajustes para personalizar las partidas y diferentes modos de campaña, muy entretenido. Me pegué varios sustos. Tiene varios logros.

It's a great, simple game for people to enjoy with a shockingly large amount of players, I recommend L4D2 more however because everything in this game is ported over to L4D2, Characters, Maps, etc. Not to mention that L4D2 has more infected, weapons, easier to add workshop add-ons to, and also way more characters and voice lines. If you're interested, get L4D2, but still a great game on it's own with an old charm to it!

Literally a dollar menu deal. Would recommend the bundle as well (LFD 1 and 2) when it goes on sale for $3.

Left 4 Dead es un juegazo, muy divertido y 100% recomendable para jugar con amigos, de los mejores cooperativos de la historia. Este primer titulo claramente esta por debajo de su secuela, sin embargo, no creo ser el único que siente que en esta primera entrega el juego tiene un ambiente mejor trabajado, más oscuro y tenebroso, e incluso que los personajes son más carismáticos y con un mejor trasfondo con respecto a la secuela. Simplemente un clásico.

8/10.
Amazing game, my go to game when i have free time. Favorite game always has been and always will be..
L4D1 will forever beat L4D2 in terms of atmosphere. But there really isn't any reason to play this with L4D2 on the market.

Unless I am mistaken, the entirely of this game is available if you buy L4D2, so buying this game is just a waste, buy the second one and save yourself some money. 
If you want an opinion on the actual game, it's absolutely awesome and stands the test of time brilliantly.

Although this game is excellent, I recommend buying Left 4 Dead 2 instead. It basically made the first one obsolete by including all the maps and characters from L4D1. On top of that, it's got a much larger player base and supports Steam Workshop.

Моя любимая игра в жанре зомбиапокалипсис. В детстве очень боялся, сейчас же спокойно прошёл, хоть и с трудностями. Атмосфера зачетная, геймплей интересный, саундтрек неплох. Советую
